subject: Re: The Ovilus list
author: leongbabe@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1223045674
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 
Could it be Seth, the spirit guide from the popular "Seth Speaks"  series by 
Jane Roberts (a best-selling book which I think came out in  the early 1980s), 
or could it be people are pk'ing this name?  These  new instruments are 
fascinating and I have been experimenting with both the Puck  and the Ovilus.  BTW 
I've never gotten the name "Seth", but have received  the name "George" 
repeatedly on the battlefields in Gettysburg.
 
Just my thoughts,
Sharon from SFGS
